results.title: Inhibition of Angiogenesis and Extracellular Matrix Remodeling: Synergistic Effect of Renin-Angiotensin System Inhibitors and Bevacizumab
results.text_hl: Then, an experiment in @CELLLINE_CVCL:0291 @@@HCT116@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Colorectal_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015179 @@@colon cancer@@@ cell xenografts in @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ was explored to confirm the combined treatment with @CHEMICAL_Bevacizumab @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068258 @@@Bev@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lis@@@), a RASI, could inhibit angiogenesis and ECM remodeling.

citations.NLM: Ren T, Jia H, Wu Q, Zhang Y, Ma Q, Yao D, Gao X, Xie D, Xu Z, Zhao Q, Zhang Y. Inhibition of Angiogenesis and Extracellular Matrix Remodeling: Synergistic Effect of Renin-Angiotensin System Inhibitors and Bevacizumab Front Oncol. 2022;12():829059. PMID: 35847929

results.title: Long-term use of angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitors is associated with decreased incidence of advanced adenomatous colon polyps.
results.text_hl: BACKGROUND: The long-term use of angiotensin converting enzyme (ACE) inhibitors may reduce the risk of developing @<m>DISEASE_Colorectal_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015179 @@@colorectal cancer@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Colorectal_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015179 @@@CRC@@@).

citations.NLM: Kedika R, Patel M, Pena Sahdala HN, Mahgoub A, Cipher D, Siddiqui AA. Long-term use of angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitors is associated with decreased incidence of advanced adenomatous colon polyps. J Clin Gastroenterol. 2011 Feb;45(2):e12-6. PMID: 20697294
